HEADLINE:
In continuation to our letter dated 29th May, 2021, we write to inform you that the Transcript of Analyst/Investor Call of Prataap Snacks Limited held on Tuesday, 1st June, 2021, for discussion on financial results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 has been uploaded on our website and the weblink of the same is as under:

http://www.yellowdiamond.in/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/PSL-Q4-FY21-Concall-Transcript.pdf

This is for your information and records.

In continuation to our letter dated 3rd November, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the transcript of the Investor call held on 7th November, 2022 to discuss the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022, is enclosed herewith.

We request you to take the same on record.

In continuation to our letter dated 21st May, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the transcript of the Investor call held on 23rd May, 2022 to discuss the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022, is enclosed herewith.

This is for your information and records.
